item.title: Scatter Plot in Rstudio
item.description: In this class we will learn how to create a scatter plot with the Lahman database, using dplyr, and using ggplot2, with ggiraph to make it interactive. First letâ€™s load some packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) Using dplyr, we want to get all the players with 400 or more HR in their careers, and the total amount of SO in their careers.
